data.eml:eml: A new species of Palaeopoecilostola Meunier, 1899 (Diptera: Limoniidae) from the Eocene Baltic amber

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kania, Iwona, Krzemiński, Wiesław (2012): A new species of Palaeopoecilostola Meunier, 1899 (Diptera: Limoniidae) from the Eocene Baltic amber. Zootaxa 3495: 42-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.213542
